abstract: Organizing committee for 2016 Olympic Games 2016 issues public apology over fatal shooting of jaguar at Olympic torch event by Brazilian soldier; mascot for Brazil's Olympic team is cartoon jaguar and live animal had appeared earlier in day for photographic session connected with publicity for Games.

headline.print_headline: Jaguar Killed After Event  for Rio Games
headline.main: Jaguar Shot Dead After Olympic Torch Event in Brazil

snippet: The animal, who had apparently escaped a zoo enclosure, was shot after she moved toward a soldier, the military said.
lead_paragraph: The animal, who had apparently escaped a zoo enclosure, was shot after she moved toward a soldier, the military said.
